resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107346</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107346</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207206</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">George Washington: A National Treasure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">George Washington: Ein Nationaler Schatz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">George Washington : Un Trésor National</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">George Washington: Um Tesouro Nacional</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">George Washington: Un Tesoro Nazionale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Γεοργε Ουάσιγκτον: Ένας εθνικός θησαυρός</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">George Washington: Un Tesoro Nacional</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">takes an in-depth look at the famous Gilbert Stuart portrait of our first president. Explore the symbolic, artistic, and biographic meanings of the sword and books by clicking on those and other objects in the 1976 painting. Learn about Washington's life, ideas, accomplishments, and his tremendous influence on the U.S.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nimmt einen eingehenden Blick am berühmten 
Gilbert Stuart Portrait unseres ersten Präsidenten. Erforschen 
Sie die symbolischen, künstlerischen und biographischen Bedeutungen 
der Klinge und der Bücher, indem Sie auf denen und andere klicken, 
Nachrichten im Anstrich 1976. Erlernen Sie über das Leben 
Washingtons, die Ideen, die Vollendungen und seinen enormen Einfluß 
auf die US.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">jette un coup d'oeil détaillé à la verticale 
célèbre de Gilbert Stuart de notre premier président. 
Explorez les significations symboliques, artistiques, et 
biographiques de l'épée et les livres en cliquant sur ceux 
et d'autres objets dans la peinture 1976. Renseignez-vous sur la
vie de Washington, des idées, des accomplissements, et son influence 
énorme sur les États-Unis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">faz exame de um olhar in-depth no retrato famoso 
de Gilbert Stuart de nosso primeiro presidente. Explore os 
meanings simbólicos, artísticos, e biographic da espada e os livros 
estalando naqueles e outros objetos na pintura 1976. Aprenda 
sobre a vida de Washington, as idéias, as realizações, e sua 
influência tremenda nos E. U..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dà un'occhiata approfondita al ritratto 
famoso di Gilbert Stuart del nostro primo presidente. Esplori i 
significati simbolici, artistici e biographic della spada ed i libri 
scattandosi su quelli ed altri oggetti nella pittura 1976. 
Impari circa vita de Washington, le idee, le realizzazioni e la 
sua influenza tremenda sugli Stati Uniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ρίχνει μια σε βάθος ματιά στο διάσημο πορτρέτο 
Gilbert stuart του πρώτου Προέδρου μας. Ερευνήστε τις 
συμβολικές, καλλιτεχνικές, και βιογραφικές έννοιες του ξίφους και
των βιβλίων με τον κρότο σε εκείνοι και άλλα αντικείμενα το 
1976 χρωματίζοντας. Μάθετε για τη ζωή της Ουάσιγκτον, τις
ιδέες, τις ολοκληρώσεις, και την τεράστια επιρροή του στις ΗΠΑ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">hecha una ojeada profundizado el retrato famoso de
Gilbert Estuardo de nuestro primer presidente. Explore los 
significados simbólicos, artísticos, y biográficos de la espada y 
los libros haciendo clic en ésos y otros objetos en la pintura 1976. 
Aprenda sobre la vida de Washington, las ideas, las 
realizaciones, y su enorme influencia en los E.E.U.U..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207206</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107346</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/george-washington-a-national-treasure</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
